message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $15000.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase it. My budget allows me to pay up to $12000 for the product.

I understand you have a budget constraint, but I'm confident that this product is worth more than $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but my budget is still a concern. I am willing to pay up to $11000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about the value of the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12500.
I understand your position, and I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to propose a price of $11500 for the product.
I'm not getting any younger, and I'd like to wrap this up. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer.

I understand your final offer, but I must respectfully decline. I believe $11500 is a fair price given the current market conditions and the value I place on the product. Thank you for considering my offers.
